name: libcss
description: Screen and print styles for app/site content

scripts.makeCSSsymlink:
echo 'current directory is: '$(npm prefix); echo '
Enter path for libcss symlink (e.g. ../testsite/css) or just press enter to continue without making a css symlink:'; read dir; echo $dir; if [ -z $dir ]; then echo 'no symlink made'; else ln -s $(npm prefix) $dir; fi
scripts.postinstall: npm run buildcss && npm run makeCSSsymlink

author: James Ackman
